availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Priscilla O'Brian. Father of Malinda O'Brian, Sally O'Brian, Victoria O'Brian, Henrietta O'Brian, and William O'Brian. Owned two enslaved persons in Trimble County in 1850. Farmer in Trimble County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, District 1, p. 305.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, p. 77.
